title: (x) Mofford Electric logo flare serif - (similar to) Kona Bold {Yves}
content:
Need some help ID’ing this font. Can anyone help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100102040009im_/http:/typophile.com/files/me_small_5155.jpg)
author: mrpunkin

comments.content:
My impression is that this is a customization that started with [Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20100102040009/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/friz-quadrata/). Note especially the crotch of the M, and the way the R is formed.

- Mike Yanega

Funny, it looks like the M in Kona Bold was tweaked to make it sort of like the M in Friz. The E and F alternates look like the sample lettering. That must be the one Yves.

- Mike Yanega
Either that or the logo was designed by Chuck Davis. The Letterhead Fonts designers are all (?) well versed in hand lettering and logo design.
